testsuite.name: SimpleBankSystemTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #11
You should not allow to transfer to a card number that doesn't pass the Luhn algorithm. You should print 'Probably you made mistake in the card number. Please try again!'
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -fileName card.s3db
1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 1 4000007465738091 2380 1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 1 4000005596471251 4325 1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 2
Enter your card number: >> 4000005596471251 Enter your PIN: > 4325
You have successfully logged in!
1. Balance 2. Add income 3. Do transfer 4. Close account 5. Log out 0. Exit > 3
Transfer Enter card number: > 2000007269641764
Enter how much money you want to transfer:
